tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE hand_geometry_images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_data BLOB,
    hand_geometry_features JSONB,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE hand_geometry_images (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    image_data BYTEA,
    image_format VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE persons (
  person_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender CHAR(1)
);
